name: internal-document-chatbot
description: A chatbot that answers questions based on user-provided document content. Deployed as a static site. API_KEY environment variable must be set on the hosting platform (e.g., Vercel).

scripts.info: echo "This project is deployed as a static site. No npm build script is typically run by Vercel for this configuration. Ensure API_KEY is set in Vercel's environment variables."
